transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello good evening. Main Ashubham bol raha tha mam IndiaMART chart office se.
Customer: Yes yes sir.
Executive: Mam actually aapka mail aaya tha customer care through which ji ji ji ji ji.
Executive: Jo hamara subah discussion hua tha wahi cheez mam aapne usme dali hui hai. Maine already isliye aapko call kiya hua tha mam dekhiye already main dekhiye mam aapka main khud profile dekh raha hun. Sari cheeze main khud check kar raha hun. Meri aapse I think 11th ko last baat hui thi. Uske baad maine fir is week bhi call kiya jaan boojh ke isliye kyunki main mujhe bhi pata hai ki dikkate hain aur usko hum log kaise seek kar sakte hain mam. Maine aapko actually main bataya tha mam aap dekhiye jab brain open hota hai mam aapka to complaint hamare paas hi aata hai ki resolution kya hai mam theek hai. Aise aapne usme mention kara hai but ye dekhiye maine aapko sahi bataya tha mam ye services hum use to kar rahe hain mam theek hai. Lekin usme bahut sare gaps bhi hain abhi bhi still. Theek hai aap main samajh sakta hun ki aap apne hisab se apne end se aapko lag raha hai ki main kar rahi hun theek hai mam but still aap IndiaMART ke hisab se dekhiye ki IndiaMART kaise kaam karta hai mam. Theek hai na. Kyunki aapke jo credits vagera hum de rahe hain mam jitne de rahe hain wo credits bhi use nahi ho pa rahe hain mam wo lapse hi ja rahe hain hamare bahut sare credits lapse ho rahe hain mam.
Executive: Aap sun rahe hain mam main kya keh raha hun.
Customer: Konse credits use nahi ho pa rahe hain sir?
Executive: Mam jo by lead wale credit hote hain na jo aapse maine subah bataya tha mam kai sari leads hamari lapse ho ja rahi hain. Theek hai abhi hamara jo engagement start ji ji mam bataiye aap boliye aap. Is it possible is it possible ki aap mere ko wo leads batao to check kar sake ki wo kahan se miss ho rahi hai?
Executive: Main bata raha hun aapne abhi IndiaMART open kiya hua hai kya?
Customer: Just a second.
Executive: Aap ek kaam kariye aap na abhi kya aapse main Google meet pe connect kar sakta hun mam abhi aap free hain kya? Ya ya sure sure sure sure sure.
Executive: Ek minute rukiye ek minute rukiye sir.
Executive: Main aapko usko bhi kar deta hun. Aap
Executive: Haan mujhe mail id mein wahi hai na last aapka ek minute rukiye. Ji ji ji.
Executive: Sales wala na sales@india
Executive: Mam ek baar check kariye mail aaya hoga mere naam se ek baar dekhiye.
Customer: Thank you.
Customer: Okay just give me two minutes time to connect.
Customer: Okay sir.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan mam aawaz aa rahi hai mam meri. Haan sir do minute dijiye main connect karti hun.
Executive: Theek hai theek hai mam main wait karta hun aap aaiye. Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's credits are lapsing.

- Wants to know which leads are missing.



Resolution:

- Executive explained how IndiaMART works.

- Executive sent a Google Meet invite.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will connect on Google Meet.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, credits, google meet, indiaMART
